items.name: Funko Pop! Rick and Morty Vinyl Figures
items.description: A collection of vinyl figures featuring various characters from the show, perfect for collectors.

items.name: Rick and Morty Collectible Pins Set
items.description: A set of enamel pins featuring different show-related designs to adorn your clothing or accessories.

items.name: Rick and Morty Plushies
items.description: Soft and huggable plush toys in the likeness of Rick, Morty, and other characters.

items.name: Portal Gun Prop Replica
items.description: A high-quality prop replica of Rick's portal gun for cosplayers and collectors.

items.name: Rick and Morty Action Figures
items.description: Poseable action figures of Rick and Morty, complete with accessories and detailed designs.

items.name: Rick and Morty Mystery Mini Figures
items.description: Blind-boxed mini figures of various characters for collecting and trading.
